title: Go Fish
resume: Go Fish is an American television sitcom that aired on NBC from June 19 to July 3, 2001. The series was created by Pam Brady and Adam Herz and starred Kieran Culkin in his first regular role in a television series. A total of five episodes were produced, leaving one of those five unaired.

A total of five episodes were produced, leaving one of those five unaired.
